title: Digital Marketing for Automotive Dealers
description: Learn digital marketing strategies specific to automotive retail. Covers social media, online advertising, and customer relationship management systems.
formatted_text:
Course: Digital Marketing for Automotive Dealers
Course ID: SKODA-003
Category: Marketing
Level: Beginner
Duration: 2 days
Instructor: Tomáš Dvořák

Description: Learn digital marketing strategies specific to automotive retail. Covers social media, online advertising, and customer relationship management systems.

Topics covered: Social media, Online advertising, CRM systems, Analytics
